H0.text: what is new york city airport. John F. Kennedy International Airport

H1.text: what is new york city airport. LaGuardia Airport

H2.text: what is new york city airport. Newark Liberty International Airport

H3.text: what is new york city airport. Flushing Airport

A4.text: JFK Airport is located in the Jamaica neighborhood of Queens, 16 miles (26 km) southeast of Midtown Manhattan.

A5.text: LaGuardia received a new terminal and longer runways from 1960 to 1966.

A6.text: LaGuardia Airport is located in East Elmhurst, Queens, New York City, United States, situated on the northwestern shore of Long Island, bordering Flushing Bay.

A7.text: The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey (PANYNJ) in 2015 announced a multibillion-dollar reconstruction of the airport's passenger infrastructure, which was completed in January 2025.
